CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR(State__c = "WA", State__c = "SA", State__c = "TAS"),
(IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Occupational Therapy $193.99" ), "Occupational Therapy $193.99: " & TEXT(OT_hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Speech Pathology $193.99" ), "Speech Pathology $193.99: " & TEXT(Speech_Pathology_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Physiotherapy $224.62" ), "Physiotherapy $224.62: " & TEXT(Physiotherapy_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Exercise Physiology $166.99" ), "Exercise Physiology $166.99: " & TEXT(Exercise_Physiology__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Behavioral Support Standard $193.99" ), "Behavioral Support $193.99: " & TEXT(Behavioral_Support_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Behavioral Support Specialist $234.83" ), "Behavioral Support Specialist $234.83: " & TEXT(Behavioral_Support_Specialist_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Psychology $234.83" ), "Psychology $234.83: " & TEXT(Psychology_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Allied Health Assistant Level 1 $56.16" ), "Allied Health Assistant Level 1 $56.16: " & TEXT(AHA_Level_1_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Allied Health Assistant Level 2 $86.79" ), "Allied Health Assistant Level 2 $86.79: " & TEXT(AHA_Level_2_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support_WA__c , "Other Therapy $193.99" ), "Other Therapy $193.99: " & TEXT(Other_Therapy_Hours__c) & "hrs" ,null )),
(IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Occupational Therapy" ), "Occupational Therapy $193.99: " & TEXT(OT_hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Speech Pathology" ), "Speech Pathology $193.99: " & TEXT(Speech_Pathology_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Physiotherapy" ), "Physiotherapy $193.99: " & TEXT(Physiotherapy_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Exercise Physiology" ), "Exercise Physiology $166.99: " & TEXT(Exercise_Physiology__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Behavioral Support Standard" ), "Behavioral Support Standard $193.99: " & TEXT(Behavioral_Support_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Behavioral Support Specialist" ), "Behavioral Support Specialist $214.41: " & TEXT(Behavioral_Support_Specialist_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Psychology" ), "Psychology $214.41: " & TEXT(Psychology_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Allied Health Assistant Level 1" ), "Allied Health Assistant Level 1 $56.16: " & TEXT(AHA_Level_1_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Allied Health Assistant Level 2" ), "Allied Health Assistant Level 2 $86.79: " & TEXT(AHA_Level_2_Hours__c) & "hrs" & ", " ,null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Therapy_Support__c , "Other Therapy $193.99" ), "Other Therapy $193.99: " & TEXT(Other_Therapy_Hours__c) & "hrs" ,null )) )
CustomField.label: Hours Split
